question: What are the latest technology trends in the healthcare industry and which companies are leading in these areas?

subtasks.task: Identify the healthcare industry type in the IndustryBusinessTrend table to understand current trends relevant to healthcare.
Gather technology focus areas related to healthcare from the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table that highlight strategic initiatives by companies in this sector.
Extract data on companies operating in the healthcare industry from the CompanyInfo table to determine which companies are active and their respective technology starts.
Cross-reference the companies from CompanyInfo with their corresponding IT technology investments in the CompanyTechStack table to identify which technologies are being adopted.
Link any identified healthcare companies with their social media performance to assess public engagement and perception regarding their tech initiatives using the SocialMediaInfo table.
